16.Description: Survey the landscape to locate mineral deposits and rocky outcrops.  Activates automatically when class is changed to miner.
16.Name: Prospect

16.Description: Survey the landscape to locate the nearest mineral deposit or rocky outcrop within skill range. Can only execute while Prospect is active. Duration: 15s
16.Name: Lay of the Land

16.Description: Reveals the conditions for obtaining HQ items while gathering.
16.Name: Preparation

16.Description: Grants another gathering attempt. When gathering collectables, restores 1 integrity.
16.Name: Solid Reason

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining regular or HQ items to 100%. Does not apply to items at 0%. Can only be activated after chain #4.
16.Name: Deep Vigor

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining items while gathering by 5%. Does not apply to items at 0%.
16.Name: Sharp Vision

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining items while gathering by 15%. Does not apply to items at 0%.
16.Name: Sharp Vision II

16.Description: Further survey the landscape to uncover unspoiled, legendary, and clouded mineral deposits and rocky outcrops.
16.Name: Truth of Mountains

16.Description: Increases the number of items obtained when gathering by one.
16.Name: King's Yield

16.Description: Increases the number of items obtained when gathering by two.
16.Name: King's Yield II

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining HQ items while gathering by 10%. Does not increase chances for items which start at 0%.
16.Name: Unearth

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining HQ items while gathering by 30%. Does not increase chances for items which start at 0%. Cannot be used with Unearth.
16.Name: Unearth II

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining HQ items while gathering by 30% - 100%. Increase is determined by your perception rating. Does not increase chances for items which start at 0%. Cannot be used with Unearth.
16.Name: Unearth III

16.Description: Increases the number of items obtained on your next gathering attempt by one, two, or three. Number determined by your gathering rating.
16.Name: Bountiful Yield II

16.Description:
Increases the chance of obtaining an HQ item on your next gathering attempt. Increase is random and is only overwritten if the value is higher than the current one. Does not increase chances for items which start at 0%.



Can be used with any action that increases chance of obtaining an HQ item.
16.Name: Nald'thal's Counsel

16.Description:
Increases elemental shard , crystal, and cluster yields by 3 .

Cannot be executed if the gathering node does not yield shards , crystals, or clusters .
16.Name: the Twelve's Bounty

16.Description: Survey the landscape to locate the highest-level mineral deposit or rocky outcrop within skill range. Can only execute while Prospect is active. Duration: 15s
16.Name: Lay of the Land II

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining items while gathering by 50%. Does not apply to items at 0%.
16.Name: Sharp Vision III

16.Description: Tread quietly, enabling you to avoid enemies up to four levels above your own.
16.Name: Sneak

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining items on your next gathering attempt by 15%. Does not apply to items at 0%.
16.Name: Clear Vision

16.Description: Increases the number of items obtained on your next gathering attempt by one.
16.Name: Bountiful Yield

16.Description: Uncovers a gathering node's hidden items. Can only be executed after HQ chain #2.
16.Name: Luck of the Mountaineer

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining an HQ item on your next gathering attempt by 10%. Does not increase chances for items which start at 0%.
16.Name: Dredge

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining an HQ item on your next gathering attempt by 20%. Does not increase chances for items which start at 0%.
16.Name: Dredge II

16.Description: Reduces the chance of obtaining HQ items to 0% but increases item yield by up to three. Number determined by your perception rating. Does not increase item yield if all gathering node items start at 0%.
16.Name: Pick Clean

16.Description: Increases elemental shard, crystal, and cluster yields by a random amount. Effect can be stacked with The Twelve's Bounty. Cannot be executed if the gathering node does not yield shards, crystals, or clusters.
16.Name: The Giving Land

16.Description: Increases the chance of obtaining items while gathering by 10%, while increasing the chance of obtaining HQ items by 20%. Does not increase chances for items which start at 0%.
16.Name: Mind of the Mountaineer

16.Description: Increases collectability of an item. Increase is determined by your gathering rating. Reduces integrity by 1.
16.Name: Scour

16.Description: Increases the collectability of an item. Increase is a random amount ranging from 50% to 150% of the effectiveness of Scour. Reduces integrity by 1.
16.Name: Brazen Prospector

16.Description: Increases collectability of an item. Increase is 75% of the effectiveness of Scour. Reduces integrity by 1. There is a chance integrity is unaffected, determined by your gathering rating.
16.Name: Meticulous Prospector

16.Description: Improves next item collectability increase. Effect is determined by your perception rating.
16.Name: Scrutiny

18.Description: Select the bait to apply to your line.
18.Name: Bait

18.Description: Cast your line and begin fishing.
18.Name: Cast

18.Description: Attempt to hook the fish nibbling on the bait.
18.Name: Hook

18.Description: Use the fish already hooked to your line to attract even larger prey.
18.Name: Mooch

18.Description: Abandon fishing and stow your equipment.
18.Name: Quit

18.Description:
Unhook a fish (including all those of the same type subsequently caught at your current location) and release it back into the wild.

Has no effect on fish that have yet to be logged in the Fish Guide.
18.Name: Release

18.Description: Tread quietly, enabling you to avoid enemies up to four levels above your own.
18.Name: Sneak

18.Description: Lights up the tip of your fishing rod.
18.Name: Cast Light

18.Description: Adds extra hooks to the line, making it possible to land normally uncatchable fish and items.
18.Name: Snagging

18.Description: Readies the catch to retain as a collectable.
18.Name: Collect

18.Description: Increases the chance of landing an HQ fish by 50% while reducing Hook efficiency by 40%. Duration: 60s Cancels current mooching opportunity.
18.Name: Patience

18.Description: Negates the Inefficient Hooking status. Has no effect on certain fish with a weak bite.
18.Name: Powerful Hookset

18.Description:
Reduces the amount of time for the next fish to bite.



Cancels current mooching opportunity.
18.Name: Chum

18.Description: Open your five senses to the surrounding environment, detecting fish in a given body of water without regard for their normal hours of activity. Has no effect on certain fish. Duration: 60s Cancels current mooching opportunity.
18.Name: Fish Eyes

18.Description: Increases the chance of landing an HQ fish by 80% while reducing Hook efficiency by 75%. Increases the likelihood of catching larger fish. Duration: 145s Cancels current mooching opportunity.
18.Name: Patience II

18.Description: Negates the Inefficient Hooking status. Has no effect on certain fish with a strong bite.
18.Name: Precision Hookset

18.Description: Ensures you catch the same fish you previously caught. Has no effect on some fish. Overwrites the effect of Veteran Trade upon execution.
18.Name: Identical Gig

18.Description: Prevent hooking the same fish you just caught. Has no effect on some fish. Duration: 15s Effect ends after hooking a fish. Cancels current mooching opportunity. Overwrites the effect of Identical Cast upon execution.
18.Name: Surface Slap

18.Description: Ensures you hook the same fish you previously caught. Has no effect on some fish. Duration: 15s Effect ends after hooking a fish, and cannot be used for consecutive casts. Cancels current mooching opportunity. Effect is canceled if the same fish cannot be caught at your current fishing location. Overwrites the effect of Surface Slap upon execution.
18.Name: Identical Cast

18.Description: Attempt to catch a fish using your gig.
18.Name: Gig

18.Description: Replace the head on your gig with one of a different size.
18.Name: Gig Head

18.Description: Survey the seas to locate teeming waters.  Activates automatically when class is changed to fisher.
18.Name: Fathom

18.Description: Survey the seas to locate the nearest teeming waters within skill range. Can only execute while Fathom is active. Duration: 15s
18.Name: Shark Eye

18.Description: Survey the landscape to locate the highest-level teeming waters within skill range. Can only execute while Fathom is active. Duration: 15s
18.Name: Shark Eye II

18.Description: Prevent catching the same fish you just caught. Has no effect on some fish. Overwrites the effect of Identical Gig upon execution.
18.Name: Veteran Trade

18.Description: Increases the number of items obtained on your next spearfishing attempt. Yield is determined by fish type and your gathering rating. Some fish cannot be double speared.
18.Name: Bountiful Catch

18.Description: Grants another spearfishing attempt.
18.Name: Calm Waters

18.Description: Increases the chance of landing a large catch on your next spearfishing attempt.
18.Name: Nature's Bounty

18.Description: Occasionally discover treasure maps while spearfishing.
18.Name: Salvage

18.Description: Further survey the seas to uncover the nearest swimming shadows within skill range.
18.Name: Truth of Oceans

18.Description:
Select fish to be automatically released upon catching them at a given fishing hole.

Settings are reset upon putting away rod.

Has no effect on fish that have yet to be logged in the Fish Guide.
18.Name: Release List

38.Description: Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 200 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies. Can only be executed while under the effect of Flourishing Fan Dance.
38.Name: Fan Dance III

38.Description: Quickly dash 10 yalms forward. Maximum Charges: Cannot be executed while bound.
38.Name: En Avant

38.Description: Increases critical hit rate and direct hit rate by 20%. Duration: 20s Additional Effect: Party member designated as your Dance Partner will also receive the effect of Devilment
38.Name: Devilment

38.Description: Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%. Duration: 15s Effect cannot be stacked with bard's Troubadour or machinist's Tactician.
38.Name: Shield Samba

38.Description: Grants you the effects of Flourishing Cascade, Flourishing Fountain, Flourishing Windmill, Flourishing Shower, and Flourishing Fan Dance.
38.Name: Flourish

38.Description: Dance to the beat of your own drum, granting Improvisation to self. Improvisation Effect: Continuously increases Esprit Gauge while in combat Duration: 15s The speed at which the gauge increases varies with the number of nearby party members. Furthermore, HP recovery via healing actions for self and nearby party members is increased by 10%. Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction). Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
38.Name: Improvisation

38.Description: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members. Cure Potency: 300 Additional Effect: Party member designated as your Dance Partner will also heal self and nearby party members
38.Name: Curing Waltz
